abstract: The new service presents news online by topic and was developed in collaboration with The New York Times and The Washington Post.
snippet: The new service presents news online by topic and was developed in collaboration with The New York Times and The Washington Post.
lead_paragraph: Google on Tuesday introduced a new approach to presenting news online by topic, developed with The New York Times and The Washington Post, and said that if the experiment succeeded, it would be made available to all publishers.

headline.print_headline: Working With 2 Big Papers, Google Tests a News-by-Topic Service
